1.title: Aliens
1.plot: Zach sets out to discover whether Aliens exist and what evidence we have to prove it. He meets with several who say they have encountered extra-terrestrial life--a man who has been abducted by aliens several times since childhood; a man who claims to have extracted an alien implant; and a woman who shows Zach what it feels like to be abducted into a spacecraft. Zach also meets with the world's leading scientists at SETI in Green Banks, West Virginia. There, utilizing the world's largest telescope, they show him the methods they employ to communicate with potential ...

2.title: Superhumans
2.plot: Our host, Zachary Quinto, treks out In Search Of the unexplained phenomena of Superhuman strength. Searching for and testing several possibilities that may explain this mystery.

3.title: Monsters of the Deep
3.plot: Zachary Quinto travels undersea with deep sea marine biologist talking about the bizarre creatures in waters that would crush almost all man made submersibles that thrive in a hostile environment.

4.title: Artificial Intelligence
4.plot: Zachary Quinto speaks with several different experts in the world of Artificial Intelligence, including speaking to Facebooks own AI Project which was shut down in 2017 due to the fact that the AI had created their own language as well as talking to one another.

5.title: Time Travel
5.plot: Zach charts a journey to determine whether time travel is possible. He meets a man who claims to have traveled back in time due to a secret government program and a group of people living in Liverpool known as "time slippers."

6.title: Sinkholes
6.plot: Zach explores the unpredictable and terrifying phenomenon of Sinkholes to determine just what causes them. He visits a Florida man whose brother was killed when their family home was literally swallowed whole by the Earth as well as a series of sinkholes that are forming a series of caves right below the houses of a quaint suburban neighborhood. Whether they be a part of some biblical prophecy or further evidence of mankind's effect on our planet, he's alarmed to discover that all the same, they can strike anywhere in the world, at any time.

7.title: Mind Control
7.plot: Zach explores the dark world of psychological mind control. He meets with a victim who was surgically implanted with an electronic harassment device in his head and neck-proving that this is a very real and terrifying phenomenon. Zach continues his search by examining the recent sonic attacks on American diplomats in Cuba and he listens to the actual sound of sonic weapon. In the end, he agrees to give up total control to of his mind, in an epic showdown with a mentalist.

8.title: Life After Death
8.plot: Zach tackles the ultimate existential question as he explores what happens when we die and whether or not we can have life after death. He meets with a Texas man who actually died and came back to life after a horrific kayaking accident. Zach continues his search by attempting to speak with spirits from beyond the grave with the help of a father and paranormal investigator who claims to have audio and video communication with his deceased daughter. Zach also looks at the strange world of cryogenics at the infamous Alcor laboratories in Arizona, and he uncovers a ...

9.title: Atlantis: Part 1
9.plot: Zachary Quinto travels to the Mediterranean with Platos 51 item checklist to mark off what would be the Fabled land of Atlantis. Here he sees ancient relics while , scuba diving , spelunking and mountain climbing into Crete first to see red, black and white stone with modern plumbing. Just a few of the itemd on a checklist for the fabled lost continent and people of Atlantis. Then travels to Sardinia where only until modern times the earth revealed long buried towers, also of red, black , and white stone. While checking off the list with only half the checklist. While...

10.title: The Empire Of Atlantis Part II
10.plot: Zach continues his epic quest to find the lost civilization of Atlantis and prove that it was a real and thriving empire.

imdb.title: In Search of...
plot: Documentary series hosted by Zachary Quinto based on the 1970s series that examined unexplained phenomena from all over the world.
